data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kaydan, Bora, Kozár, Ferenc (2008): Two new genera and species of Eriococcidae (Hemiptera: Sternorrhyncha: Coccoidea) with new data on the family in Turkey. Zootaxa 1848: 16-26, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.183346
